item.title: Payroll
item.description: Overview Here you can manage your employees’ salary and all the other related costs. Totals First thing that you see is a table which shows, by month and for the selected year, the company’s headcount and the sum of costs related to payroll. The sum of costs are displayed in the Total row, they’re a combination of costs coming from placeholders, employees and adjustments. The Headcount shows the amount of employees and placeholders with costs that impact on the company for the selected year.
